name: ALT_BPA_CHAIN_ID
description: This table holds the asynchronous BestPractice Advisory (BPA) chains that are associated with this Alerts (ALT) contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: ALT_CHAIN_ID
columns.description: This item links alert record contacts that occur in a chain together with a unified ID.
